author: cms-sw
body:
- Update frontier cline tto version 2.10.2
- Use frontier client sources directly from http://frontier.cern.ch/dist as we do not have any CMS specific patches to apply
- Update pacparser 1.4.2 which contains security fix for https://github.com/manugarg/pacparser/security/advisories/GHSA-62q6-v997-f7v9

This resolves #8549
title: Update frontier client to version 2.10.2
